options.label: A
options.text: Cancer cells can spread to any part of the body through metastasis

options.label: B
options.text: Cancer cells die easily in the wrong microenvironment

options.label: C
options.text: The lymphatic system provides a large network for cancer cells to spread

options.label: D
options.text: The site of metastasis is determined by the location of vascular and lymphatic channels

options.label: A

options.label: B
options.text: It provides a large network for cancer cells to spread

options.label: C
options.text: It has no role in the process of metastasis

options.label: D
options.text: It is only involved in the early stages of cancer development
